_sText:
it was fun makeing de_arctic_base it took many hours   

date 2009 december 30 th 1808 hours 

the ct team has been sent the arctic to stop the T team from planting the bomb will the ct's win?

I know its a bomb defuse map but it is also a deathmatch map teamplay is high look at all the space i mean look ct's can be fighting 20 t's and a few sneak in to plant the bomb. then the ct's notice someone planted the bomb then try to stop em and if the bomb is at a 40 second fuse the ct's chances of winning are short aka its a crazy fun nutshell also i used to play hard games wait i still am so i try to make it ard as possible sorry :D
